channel.title: Scheduled Tasks on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Scheduled Tasks on TLDRBins

item.title: Cron Jobs
item.description: Check Cron Jobs ls -la /etc/cron.d/ cat /etc/crontab crontab -l Check background processes Downlaod pspy ./pspy

item.title: Scheduled tasks
item.description: Check scheduled tasks schtasks /query # List details schtasks /TN \Microsoft\Windows\<FOLDER>\<TASKNAME> /FO LIST /V
